sentences.en: A shefiend's whiteness under her rancid rags.
sentences.cn: 她那件酸臭破烂的衣衫下面,是魔女般的白皙肌肤.

sentences.en: Butter is perishable and can go rancid.
sentences.cn: 黄油很容易变质，而且会发臭。

sentences.en: Butyric. Rancid odour of some spoiled wines.
sentences.cn: 坏奶油味的: 描述一些破败葡萄酒所散发出的腐臭气味.

sentences.en: Dirty diapers are disgusting. Rotten eggs smell rancid. But skunks really stink!
sentences.cn: 脏尿布臭气熏天, 臭鸡蛋令人作呕,但臭鼬才真的是臭不可闻!

sentences.en: Do not eat food fried in rancid lard for it is harmful to your health.
sentences.cn: 哈喇油炸出来的食物对人体有害,不要吃.

sentences.en: Food producers use hydrogenation to keep fat from becoming rancid.
sentences.cn: 食品加工商采用氢化作用防止脂肪变腐臭.

sentences.en: Out of buckets of rancid water in tiger country, out of his canteen in the desert.
sentences.cn: 在虎乡用腥臭的水洗.在沙漠中用自己罐头筒盛水洗.
发酵不好的青贮料其味道腐臭.

sentences.en: Rancid butter and margarine are notorious.
sentences.cn: 哈喇奶油和人造奶油的难闻气味是众所周知的.

sentences.en: Rancid oil will taint the flavour.
The butter has gone / turned rancid.
The grocer took back the rancid butter.
sentences.cn: 杂货店老板让把变了味的黄油退给了他.

sentences.en: The seas wouldn't be turning rancid.
sentences.cn: 大海就不会变得腥臭不堪.

sentences.en: We all know that fats spoil by becoming rancid.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道油脂变质后会发臭。

words.tran_cn: 腐臭的；令人作呕的，讨厌的

trans.tran_cn: （指含有油脂食物）因变质而有陈腐味道或气味的，（指气味或味道）如陈腐脂肪味的
trans.tran_en: oily or fatty food that is rancid smells or tastes unpleasant because it is no longer fresh
